profesionalProfile.summary: Software engineer focused on the following languages and technologies
techs: Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations

functions: Participation in the analysis, design, and architecture of developments, both internal and for clients
Ensuring the quality of developments delivered to internal or external clients
Ensuring compliance with internal development procedures
Estimation and/or validation of development estimates
Supporting project activities requested by project managers to validate the requirements of each project
Supporting the analysis and definition of environments required by the client and the ongoing project to ensure the stability and quality of the solution
Validating that functional designs have technical feasibility and making necessary recommendations to improve the proposed design
Participating in the review of gaps, their definition, and scope, as requested by the project manager and/or functional architect
Providing technical support in project pre-sales, analyzing and proposing efficient and viable solutions for the client
Collaborating in the design of environments required by the project
Contributing to the definition of the project scope
Drafting scope documents for each technical requirement and/or development required in the projects
Design and development of solutions in Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations
Design and development of solutions in Dynamics AX 2012
Support for solutions in Dynamics AX 2009
Development of solutions for the extension of Dynamics AX 2012 point of sale
Development of system integration solutions using the Dynamics CRM .NET SDK
Development of functional and integration solutions through plugin development in Dynamics CRM
Development of integrations using AIF Services for Dynamics AX 2012
Development of integrations using REST Custom Services API for Dynamics 365 F&O
Development of integrations using SOAP ASP Web Services
Development of integrations using .NET Core REST APIs
Development of solutions and interfaces based on C#.Net
Development and certification process for the Microsoft Marketplace of verticals and fiscal layers developed in Dynamics 365 F&O
Configuring and managing version control projects for development projects using Azure DevOps
Support for solutions in Dynamics AX 2009
Development and support for solutions in Dynamics AX 2012
Development and support for ERP solutions based on .NET, SPC 5+
Development of solutions based on ADO.NET and SQLServer
